title: Breakfast Burrito
summary: Warm and filling burrito filled with scrambled eggs, black beans, and avocado.

title: Chicken Salad
summary: Refreshing salad made with grilled chicken, mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, and cucumber.

title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
summary: Classic comfort food sandwich filled with melted cheese between two slices of bread.

title: Tacos Al Pastor
summary: Spicy Mexican dish made with marinated pork, pineapple, onions, and cilantro.

title: Pizza Margherita
summary: Simple Italian pizza topped with fresh basil, mozzarella, and tomato sauce.

title: Baked Salmon
summary: Juicy salmon fillet served with lemon butter sauce and steamed asparagus.
